'''Anahāru''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Anaharu was the previous priest of [Ngati](/ngati/) at [Tikawara](/tikawara/), one who lost the fight with [Ranga Ruānu](/rangaRuanu/), but swore to continue fighting against the VTC nonetheless. By sacrificing his essence to the adra pillar at [Poko Kohara](/pokoKohara/), he entered the realm of adra and used his power to block the flow of souls, unleashing terrible storms on the region in a bid to counter [Vailian scheming](/vailianTradingCompany/). He believes that not only is he carrying out Ngati's will and protecting the village, but that he's also protecting the people of Tikawara.
